title: Passion Marina
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe/restaurant with several locations. Offers some vegetarian, raw, and vegan dishes. Has freshly squeezed juices, smoothies, and protein shakes with boosters like wheat grass, milk thistle, ginseng, and echinacea. Salads are a specialty, like the couscous salad and the macrobiotic tofu salad. Uses local and organic ingredients when possible. Located near the Ibiza Marina, about 600 meters from Gran Hotel and Pacha night club.  Address in Catalan: Passeig Joan Carles I, 23.
